name: Wire/D/Roids
description:
A simple game about controlling and connecting wires through the use of drones.  Created for the Sidequest Jam #2 on the 24th May 2020.

Click on drones to activate them. Then, used WASD to move. Connect all of the wires in the correct places to move on.

If you ever get stuck, press R to restart. You can't unconnect a wire once it's connected.
